google1.search_query: How do I create an account?
instructions: Enter user-selected first name in text field with first name
Enter user-selected last name in text field with last name
Enter user-selected username in text field with username
Enter user-selected password in text field with password
Enter user-selected password in text field with confirm

google2.search_query: Manage your device identity and protected content
instructions: Select the Turn off Allow sites to play protected content checkbox
Enter user-selected Email in text box with Email or phone
Enter user-selected password in text box with password
Click the question icon in the top right
Enter comments in text field with comments
At the bottom right, click Send.

pinterest1.search_query: How do I create an advertiser account?
instructions: Enter user-selected Email Address in text field with Email Address text
Enter user-selected password in text field with password text
Click Ads in the top left corner
Click Arrow button next to your name
Enter the user-selected name in text field with name

pinterest2.search_query: How do I reset my password?
instructions: Enter your email in text field
Click Send a password reset email
Read to User: Check the email address connected to your account for a password reset email
Enter user-selected email in text field under email address or username
Enter user-selected password in text field under password
ask User for new email address
Enter user-selected email address in text field under email text
Enter user-selected email in text field under email address or username
Enter user-selected password in text field under password

walmart2.search_query: How do I reset my password?
instructions: Enter user-selected email address in text field with email address
Read to user: Check your email for the code. Be sure to check your junk or spam folder.
Enter user-selected code in text field with code
